value.title: Quantum Computing: What Does It Mean For AI (Artificial Intelligence)?
value.excerpt: So then what is quantum computing? Well, it is similar to traditional computing, which relies on bits—that is, the 0’s and 1’s to encode information. But quantum computing as its own version of this: the quantum bit or qubit.

value.title: There is a crisis of face recognition and policing in the US
